configs.author: Artifex Software
configs.name: MuPDF viewer
configs.additionalSettings: {"intermediateLink":[],"customLinkFilterRegex":"","filterByLinkText":false,"skipSort":false,"reverseSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":false,"versionExtractWholePage":false,"requestHeader":[{"requestHeader":"User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/114.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36"}],"defaultPseudoVersioningMethod":"partialAPKHash","trackOnly":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"(?:(\\d+)\\.)?(?:(\\d+)\\.)?(?:(\\d+)\\.\\d+)a","matchGroupToUse":"","versionDetection":false,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"apkFilterRegEx":"android-viewer.apk","invertAPKFilter":false,"autoApkFilterByArch":true,"appName":"MuPDF viewer","shizukuPretendToBeGooglePlay":false,"allowInsecure":false,"exemptFromBackgroundUpdates":false,"skipUpdateNotifications":false,"about":"","refreshBeforeDownload":false}

description.en: MuPDF viewer is an app for reading PDF, XPS, CBZ, and unprotected EPUB documents.
